title: The Age of Light - feelings about her new life

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Scharer uses literary elements and techniques to convey Lee’s complex feelings about her new life.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Scharer uses literary elements and techniques to convey Lee’s complex feelings about her new life.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
